isis.stitle: PRE-DELIVERY/QUALITY INSPECTION INSTRUCTION MANUAL FOR FBC/BUS/STRIPPED CHASSIS - INSPECTION - EXTERIOR INSPECTION

svcproc.title: EXTERIOR INSPECTION
svcproc.para: 28. Hood alignment to cowl/fender extension(s). Adjust as required. Torque hood mounting fasteners if equipped. See Item (B) for specifications.

item.para: Make sure the gap (hood-to-cowl clearance) is 1/2 ± .125 inch (12.7 ± 3.175 mm). (Refer to Figure 1.)

Re-torque mounting fasteners. Tighten the rear hinge half-to-radiator core support fasteners to 50-60 ft-lbs. (68-81 Nm). Tighten the front hinge half-to-rear hinge half fasteners to 30-38 ft-lbs. (41-51 Nm). (Refer to Figure 2.)
Hood-to-bumper gap must be 2.5 ± .25 inches (63.5 ± 6.35 mm). (Refer to Figure 3.). This gap is necessary to prevent contact between components during normal frame twist.
Hood locater adjustment. (Refer to Figure 4.) Rear surface of hood bumper must be set .56 ± .03 inch (14.2 ± 7.6 mm) out past the rear edge of hood.

calloutgroup.callout1: 2. TOP OF HOOD MUST COMPRESS RUBBER SEAL BUT MAY NOT BE OVER 1/8 INCH ABOVE TOP OF COWL

figure.caption: Figure 2. Hood Hinge Mounting Fastener Location

calloutgroup.callout1: 1. REAR HINGE HALF-TO-RADIATOR CORE SUPPORT FASTENERS
2. FRONT HINGE HALF-TO-REAR HINGE HALF FASTENERS
1. HOOD SHOULD BE FLUSH ± 1/8 INCH AT COWL SIDE
2. HOOD-TO-BUMPER GAP = 2 1/2 ± 1/4 INCHES (MEASURED AT FRAME WIDTH)
NOTE: PUSH THE HOOD TOWARD THE CAB SO THAT THE RUBBER BUMPERS CONTACT THE COWL PANEL. HOLD THE HOOD AGAINST THE CAB BY ENGAGING THE LATCHES ON BOTH SIDES OF THE VEHICLE.

svcproc.para: 29. Hood opening and closing operation if equipped.

item.para: Make sure hood opens and closes without binding or roughness.

svcproc.para: 30. Clearance of hood assist springs/hardware and fixed splash shield(s) to all engine compartment components if equipped.

item.para: Check attachment of assist springs/hardware and fixed splash shields to ensure they are in the correct position. Tighten any loose items.
If any paint problems are found, be sure to indicate exactly where they are in the comments section of the form.

svcproc.para: 32. Verify engine cover fit (FC models only).

item.para: Verify by sight and touch that the cover is tight against the seal. If not, adjust latch.
